Package org.eclipse.actf.model.ui.editor.actions

This package includes actions commonly used for ACTF Editors.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DisableDebugMessageAction
    Action to invoke disableScriptDebugger method of the current active IWebBrowserACTF
    FavoritesMenu
    MenuManager for favorites control
    GoBackAction
    Action to invoke goBackward method of the current active IWebBrowserACTF
    GoForwardAction
    Action to invoke goForward method of the current active IWebBrowserACTF
    RefreshAction
    Action to invoke refresh method of the current active IWebBrowserACTF
    StopAction
    Action to invoke stop method of the current active IWebBrowserACTF
    TextSizeAction
    Action to invoke setFontSize method of the current active IWebBrowserACTF
    TextSizeMenu
    MenuManager for text size control
